title: Kan Irandil Modhi Lyrics Uthama Puthiran
stanzas: <div>Kan Irandil Modhi Lyrics Uthama Puthiran

Kan irandil modhi
nana vizhunthene.
kaaranam indriye
naan siriththaene.

en manadhum yeno
ennidam illai
vendiye unnidam
naan tholaithaene

en uyirin uyire
en iravin nilave
un arugil varave
nee tharuvaai varamey

oorukulla kodi ponnu
yaaraiyum nenaikkalaiye
undhan mugam paartha
pinne edhuvum pidikkalaiye

unnudaiya paarvaiyila
en udambu veguthadi
pakkathile nee irundhaa
en vayasu noguthadi.

Kan irandil modhi
nana vizhunthene.
kaaranam indriye
naan siriththaene.

en manadhum yeno
ennidam illai
vendiye unnidam
naan tholaithaene

oh yedho onnu solla
en nenjukuli thalla
nee poththi vachcha
aasai ellaam
kannu munna thallaada

kannamoochi aattam
en kannukulla aada
nee sollum solla
kaetkaamalae undhan
ullam thindaada.

ullukkula padapadakka
nenjukulla siragadikka
kaalu rendu rekka kaati
maele keele para parakka

pattu poochi pattaampoochi
aanaeney.

un muththu muthu pechu
en sngeethama aachu
un sundu viral theendaiyila
ninnu pochu en moochu

panju meththa megam
adhil senju vachcha dhegam
nee thoorathile ninnaakooda
pongiduthe en mugam

mutta kannu muzhi azhagil
kuthi kuthi konnavalae
sikkiktta en manasa
oora vachi thuvachchavale

aathukulla ammikallaa
poneney..

oorukulla kodi ponnu
yaaraiyum nenaikkalaiye
undhan mugam paartha
pinne edhuvum pidikkalaiye

unnudaiya paarvaiyila
en udambu veguthadi
pakkathile nee irundhaa
en vayasu noguthadi.

Kan irandil modhi
nana vizhunthene.
kaaranam indriye
naan siriththaene.

en manadhum yeno
ennidam illai
vendiye unnidam
naan tholaithaene

en uyirin uyire
en iravin nilave
un arugil varave
nee tharuvaai varamey
